title: Welcome to Your Justia Insights Newsletter
message: Stay informed with the newsletter designed to bring updates and insights from our team directly to the Justia Connect community.

Get our answers to some common SEO questions and learn more about the consequences of failing to prioritize web accessibility. Catch up on the legal and technology news that recently made headlines and take a peek at what the Justia team has been up to over the last month.
Time is running out to use one of your Justia Connect Pro Membership benefits: the $200 Justia Credit.* It will expire on {Date}.

Don't let your $200 go to waste! From an optimized website through Justia Elevate to increased visibility with Justia Premium Placements on the Justia Lawyer Directory and PPC management services through Justia Amplify, we have a legal marketing solution for your various needs.
note: *See Justia Connect Pro Credit Terms of Use for applicable conditions.
